titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ طَافَ وَ اخْتَصَرَ فِي الْحِجْرِ
titles.en: Chapter 133 – The one who performs Tawaaf and cuts it short at the (Black) Stone

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ طَافَ وَ اخْتَصَرَ فِي الْحِجْرِ
titles.en: Chapter 133 – The one who performs Tawaaf and cuts it short at the (Black) Stone

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَفْصِ بْنِ الْبَخْتَرِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الرَّجُلِ يَطُوفُ بِالْبَيْتِ فَاخْتَصَرَ قَالَ يَقْضِي مَا اخْتَصَرَ مِنْ طَوَافِهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hafs Bin Al Bakhtary, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws regarding the man who performs Tawaaf by the House, but cuts it short. Heasws said: ‘He should fulfil what he shortens from his Tawaaf’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مُعَاوِيَةَ بْنِ عَمَّارٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنِ اخْتَصَرَ فِي الْحِجْرِ فِي الطَّوَافِ فَلْيُعِدْ طَوَافَهُ مِنَ الْحَجَرِ الْأَسْوَدِ إِلَى الْحَجَرِ الْأَسْوَدِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Muawiya Bin Ammar, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘The one who cuts short at the (Black) Stone during the Tawaaf, so let him repeat his Tawaaf from the Black Stone to the Black Stone’.
